Package objects.animal.controller

Class AnimalDeathController

java.lang.Object
objects.animal.controller.AnimalDeathController
public class AnimalDeathController
extends java.lang.Object
Animal's death controller handles the status changes and view changes after the Animal is dead.

It accesses to AnimalModel by using the reference to Animal and checks if the Animal is dead. It has checkStatus(long) to check the status of the Animal. This class also handles the view (images) of Animal when it dies.

  • Field Details

    • animal

      private Animal animal
      Reference to Animal object.

      With this reference, AnimalDeathController gets the control of the whole Animal object.

    • carD

      private int carD
      Time counter.

  • Constructor Details

    • AnimalDeathController

      public AnimalDeathController​(Animal animal)
      Saves the reference to Animal instance.
      Parameters:
      animal - Animal that will be handled death

  • Method Details

    • checkStatus

      public void checkStatus​(long now)
      It runs in every frame to check if Animal is dead, if dead, sets coresponding view.

      If the status of Animal equals to 1(car death), sets car death images for Animal and reset the position of Animal. If the status of Animal equals to 2(water death), sets water death images for Animal and reset the position of Animal. Else, it does nothing.

      Parameters:
      now - the current time

    • setCarDeath

      private void setCarDeath​(long now)
      Handles the car death: set car death images for Animal.

      There are 3 images for car death of Animal. It changes the images in every 1s.

      Parameters:
      now - the current time

    • setWaterDeath

      private void setWaterDeath​(long now)
      Handles the water death: set water death images for Animal.

      There are 4 images for water death of Animal. It changes the images in every 1s.

      Parameters:
      now - the current time

    • die

      private void die()
      When Animal dies, it checks if the score of Animal is greater than 50pts, if it is than decrease 50pts.

      Updates information in AnimalModel: decrease the lives of Animal and checks if the game is over. It notifies all Animal listeners (BoardController) to update information in BoardModel and BoardView.

    • getImage

      private javafx.scene.image.Image getImage​(AnimalView animalImagesController, int number)
